before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"61k78","text":"RNA extracted from Qiagen RNeasy Plant Extraction Kit, or equivalent quantity and quality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":33}],"data":[]},{"key":"7pltf","text":"RNA used for cDNA synthesis for qPCR should be high quality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1evgu","text":"A260/A280 values  \u003e 1.8, ideally values approach 2.1 (note in SYBR green guide they recommend using samples with \u003e2).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":1,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":6,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9f4ds","text":"There is no defined rule for an acceptable A260/A230 ratio for qPCR.  A low value is often the result of guanidium thiocyanate contamination from the extraction procedure, and that concentrations of up to 100 mM are tolerated. A good rule of thumb, A260/A230 values should be \u003e 1.8, and for pure RNA expect values 2.1-2.3.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":276,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":205,"length":20}],"data":[]},{"key":"2rn2v","text":"RNA integrity as indicated by Qubit RNA IQ values \u003e5, ideally \u003e 8. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3894A140FAC811EBBA3789F1AD17023C","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/qiagen-rneasy-plant-rna-extraction-protocol-modifi-bwjepcje"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4C521E5BFAC711EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/resources/faq?id=c59936fb-4f1e-4191-9c16-ff083cb24574\u0026lang=en#:~:text=FAQ,-Print%20Bookmark%20Share\u0026text=The%20efficiency%20of%20downstream%20applications,lower%20limit%20of%20this%20ratio."}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"38etr","text":"The SuperScript® III First-Strand Synthesis System for RT-PCR is used to synthesize first-strand cDNA from purified  total RNA. RNA targets from 100 bp to \u003e12 kb can be detected with this system. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bjcat","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ga2r","text":"The procedure follows the manufacturer's instructions but includes lab specific template and reagent amounts and specifies primers and equipment for use in our lab to prepare total RNA samples for qPCR analysis of gene expression.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ek16","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"57am","text":"The original protocol is attached below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5uv19","text":"  \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9f6ul","text":"Kit:  Script™ III First-Strand Synthesis System, ThermoFisher Catalog number: 18080051","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":6,"length":80}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"54971C30FAC611EBBA3789F1AD17023C","id":127778,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"superscriptIIIfirststrand_pps.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/d63cbh8gf.pdf"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7B6CAB40FAC611EBBA3789F1AD17023C","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/18080051#/18080051"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6cetd","text":"Always wear gloves  and change them often to avoid RNases.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ovp6","text":"Use RNase-free solutions. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5kfts","text":"Use RNase-free certified, disposable plasticware and filter tips whenever possible.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2cfgc","text":"Allow reagents to thaw completely, mix, and briefly minicentrifuge 10 mM dNTP mix and 50 ng/ul random hexamers before use. Store on ice when not in use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84hkl","text":"Label two PCR tubes per sample, RT and NRT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3epiu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"28c4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f2ani","text":"Best practice for qPCR is to prepare a no reverse transcriptase (NRT) reaction for each of your samples to ensure that minimal genomic DNA remains in your reverse transcriptase sample and that only cDNA, not gDNA, is being interpreted as gene expression in your qPCR results.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81ddo","text":"Treat gloves and pipettes with RNase away  and sterilize work area with 70% ethanol before pipetting reagents.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ak6ht","text":"If performing many reactions, make a master mix of primer random hexamers, dNTP mix, and water, multiply each component by the number of reactions needed plus at least 20% to account for pipetting error. Remember that you will need two reactions for each sample.  Pipette   of the prepared master mix into each sample tube, both RT and NRT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":272,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ecqi1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"42j0g","text":" If only a few reactions are needed, pipette the following for 1 reaction into each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fs4pn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ndqa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9v6li","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"05D55260FAD011EBB294C5013676B09C","id":"88933","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",null],"colWidths":["210","142","140"],"data":[["Component","Amount for 1 rxn","Amount for 10 rxn"],["50 ng/ul Random Hexamers","1 ul","10 ul"],["10 mM dNTP Mix","1 ul","10 ul"],["DEPC-treated or MilliQ (18.2 MΩ.cm) water","3 ul","30 ul"]],"guid":"F811AAD0FAC911EBB294C5013676B09C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","Amount for 1 rxn","Amount for 10 rxn"],["50 ng/ul Random Hexamers","1 ul","10 ul"],["10 mM dNTP Mix","1 ul","10 ul"],["DEPC-treated or MilliQ (18.2 MΩ.cm) water","3 ul","30 ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ch38","text":"Add   of high quality RNA from each sample to the respective RT and NRT tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9lrui","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9rj12","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4pdhs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"115C8630FAD011EBB294C5013676B09C","id":"88934","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":91}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"de667","text":"Keep RNA samples on dry ice when not actively in use to inhibit RNases.  Return samples to   as soon as possible.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66g0f","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1EA36B60FAD011EBB294C5013676B09C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d96st","text":"Incubate the tube at   for    in the thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a1lv7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"14D420C0FAD011EBB294C5013676B09C","id":"49151","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"A1A87910FACB11EBB294C5013676B09C","id":"79863","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ntsu","text":"Allow reagents to thaw completely, mix,  and briefly centrifuge 10X RT buffer, 25 mM MgCl2, 0.1 M DTT, 40 U/ul RNase OUT, and 200 U/ul SuperScript III RT before use. Store   when not in use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":89,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":172,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3vc3m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"293D5900FAD011EBB294C5013676B09C","id":"49153","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ae7s","text":"Prepare a cDNA Synthesis (RT) Master Mix adding each component in the indicated order. Adjust the table for the number of RT samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8h4g9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aac5r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4a06l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8nbf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["47","170","112","117"],"data":[["Order","Component","Amount for 1 rxn","Amount for 10 rxn"],["1","10X RT buffer","2 ul","20 ul"],["2","25 mM MgCl2","4 ul","40 ul"],["3","0.1 M DTT","2 ul","20 ul"],["4","40 U/ul RNase OUT","1 ul","10 ul"],["5","200 U/ul SuperScript III RT","1 ul","10 ul"]],"guid":"A00E5BA0FACC11EBB294C5013676B09C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Order","Component","Amount for 1 rxn","Amount for 10 rxn"],["1","10X RT buffer","2 ul","20 ul"],["2","25 mM MgCl2","4 ul","40 ul"],["3","0.1 M DTT","2 ul","20 ul"],["4","40 U/ul RNase OUT","1 ul","10 ul"],["5","200 U/ul SuperScript III RT","1 ul","10 ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6o0fn","text":"Add   of the cDNA Synthesis (RT) Master Mix to each tube labeled RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bp62l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"30D6D7E0FAD011EBB294C5013676B09C","id":"88935","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

Adjust the table for the number of NRT samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1pn25","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4uv8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9jptj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b496s","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["47","277","112","117"],"data":[["Order","Component","Amount for 1 rxn","Amount for 10 rxn"],["1","10X RT buffer","2 ul","20 ul"],["2","25 mM MgCl2","4 ul","40 ul"],["3","0.1 M DTT","2 ul","20 ul"],["4","40 U/ul RNase OUT","1 ul","10 ul"],["5","DEPC-treated or MilliQ (18.2 MΩ.cm) water","1 ul","10 ul"]],"guid":"15D26C77FACD11EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Order","Component","Amount for 1 rxn","Amount for 10 rxn"],["1","10X RT buffer","2 ul","20 ul"],["2","25 mM MgCl2","4 ul","40 ul"],["3","0.1 M DTT","2 ul","20 ul"],["4","40 U/ul RNase OUT","1 ul","10 ul"],["5","DEPC-treated or MilliQ (18.2 MΩ.cm) water","1 ul","10 ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jd27","text":"Program a thermocycler for the following and run all samples, both RT and NRT:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccame","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fodo5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"28idu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kggc","text":"The samples can be removed after the 5 minute incubation at 85oC is complete, they do not need to reach 4oC in the thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":62,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":105,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["Step","Time (m:s)","Temp (C)"],["1","10:00","25"],["2","50:00","50"],["3","5:00","85"],["4","Infinity","4"]],"guid":"8D4856A0FACD11EBB294C5013676B09C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Step","Time (m:s)","Temp (C)"],["1","10:00","25"],["2","50:00","50"],["3","5:00","85"],["4","Infinity","4"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
